sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Tensions rise over the Black Sea after a Russian jet collides with an American surveillance drone, causing U.S. forces to bring the drone down in international waters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: China and Russia slam the latest AUKUS submarine pact, accusing Washington, Canberra and London of adopting a Cold War mentality and risking regional stability and peace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Brussels wants to give consumers the right to choose a long-term energy contract at a fixed price.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It looks to help people deal with the energy crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The U.S. military says a Russian jet collided with an American surveillance drone over the Black Sea,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: causing U.S. forces to bring the device down in international waters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: In a statement, the U.S. European Command said two Russian SU fighter jets, quote, conducted an unsafe and unprofessional intercept of an American drone that was operating within the international airspace over the Black Sea. Russian and U.S.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: aircraft have operated in the area during the course of the Ukraine war, but this is the first known such interaction, a potentially dangerous escalation at a critical time in the fighting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The center of Kramatorsk in eastern Ukraine was the target of fresh Russian bombings on Tuesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In an all too familiar scene, residential buildings were hit, at least one person was killed and several others injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: were hit, at least one person was killed and several others injured. According to local authorities, the Russian strikes damaged nine apartment blocks and a children's preschool.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Kramatorsk has been a significant battleground since 2014, when pro-Russian forces occupied Donetsk before being driven out in July 2014, bringing the city back under Ukrainian control.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: These attacks come as Sergei Shoigu, the Russian defense minister, ordered the doubling of the production of precision-guided weapons during a visit to one of Russia's leading arms manufacturers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In the east, Ukrainian forces on the front line continue to be pounded by Russian artillery.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: On Tuesday, the Ukrainian Interior Ministry said Russian forces launched deadly rocket strikes against civilian infrastructure in Sumy and the Donetsk region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Moscow said it does not recognize the jurisdiction of the International Criminal Court in The Hague. Now this statement came in even before the ICC prosecutor formally announced the opening of the two war crimes cases and issuing arrest warrants for several Russians deemed responsible for the targeting of Ukrainian civilian infrastructure and the mass abduction of Ukrainian children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Reintegration of Temporarily Occupied Territories Irina Vereshchuk confirmed that Russia has illegally deported more than 2,160 Ukrainian orphans to Russia. The Ukrainian government previously verified the illegal deportation of a total of more than 16,200 children to Russia including those deported alongside their families.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Now the Russian government doesn't deny taking Ukrainian children and has made their adoption by Russian families a centerpiece of propaganda. The Institute for the Study of War previously reported on a Russian documentary series following Ukrainian children after what Moscow calls adoption into Russian families. The estimated total of illegally deported Ukrainian children may be closer to 150,000. Now the Institute for the Study of War continues to assess that the forcible deputation and adoption of Ukrainian children is a violation of the Geneva Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide and a potential constituent element of a wider ethnic cleansing campaign.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Russian lower house has approved an amendment, which, if approved by the upper house and President Putin will punish anyone who publishes false information or

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: attempts to discredit the volunteer groups fighting in Ukraine with up to 15 years in prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: This is an extension of the laws passed by the Russian government a year ago, which sought to suppress any criticism of the so-called special military operation in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Yevgeny Prigozhin, leader of the mercenary group Wagner, welcomed the news, having asked the Russian parliament in January to extend the laws to ban negative media reports about his men.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Up until now, it was only Russia's military that was protected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: This comes on the same day that the Lithuanian parliament declared Wagner a terrorist group.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In its resolution it states that Russian mercenaries have committed serious crimes which amount to terrorism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Wagner has played an important role in Russia's offensive, but the battle of Bakhmut has revealed tensions between the group's leadership and the Russian army.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: China and Russia have warned that the submarine pact between the US, the UK and Australia paves the way for future conflict.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Beijing's foreign ministry accused the three powers of returning to a Cold War stance, while Russia's foreign minister, Sergei Lavrovrov said the West was fuelling tensions in Asia. you The AUKUS deal is the latest in a series of developments that have heightened tensions between the West with both China and Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Countries have deepened relations in recent months, with Washington warning that Beijing may soon provide arms to Moscow as it continues its war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Amnesty International published a new report on Tuesday, in which it denounced the increasingly widespread use of riot weapons, such as rubber and plastic bullets, by police around the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Amnesty has joined up with 30 other organisations to call for the signing of an international treaty against the use of what it calls instruments of torture.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In the report, Amnesty International's Patrick Wilkins said the manufacture and trade of weapons known as kinetic impact projectiles, rubber and plastic bullets, need to be controlled to combat what he called an escalating cycle of abuse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The report is the result of five years of research in tens of countries and reveals that thousands of protesters and bystanders have been injured and dozens killed as a result of the use of these weapons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: and dozens killed as a result of the use of these weapons. In France, for example, nearly 2,500 protesters were injured at the height of the Yellow Vest protests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: 440 eye injuries have been recorded in Chile since protests against inequality began in 2019, but Amnesty International says the real numbers are probably much higher.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The overhaul of the EU's electricity market will have to wait.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Plans to restructure it in the wake of the energy crisis are on hold for now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Instead, the European Commission is opting to revise the existing rules to reduce price volatility.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The main idea is to protect consumers by introducing the right to choose a long-term contract with a fixed price.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: People could also have multiple contracts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Consumers should also have a right to opt for less risky options, that means fixed price contracts and this is the part of the proposal. On top of that, we will argue that consumers should have a right for several contracts so that they can, for example, cover their consumption with fixed price but charge their electric vehicle at these hours when prices are low based on flexible contract.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: With this proposal, the European Commission is ignoring calls by some E.U. countries like France and Spain that want to separate gas and electricity prices, which are currently coupled together.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The aim of this is to avoid the high prices of fossil fuels, as seen during last year's market disruption.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Some socialist MEPs think the proposal is a step propuesta es un paso en la dirección correcta, pero no va lo suficientemente lejos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Creo que podemos ser más ambiciosos, mejorarla, trabajando conjuntamente y hacer unas propuestas que vayan en la dirección correcta a la hora de dar una señal muy importante.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Y es que las renovables deben ser las que acaben marcando el precio en el futuro a la Unión Europea, el precio de la electric electricity, but also that these renewables receive enough remuneration to make them profitable and to allow them to continue investing in them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Commission's proposal also wants to see further investment in renewables as part of its push to reduce dependency on Russian gas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Controversially, the nuclear energy sector is put forward as a pathway to a greener future.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A heated debate is expected among EU countries before the proposals are signed off, something that is likely to happen at the end of this year or the beginning of next.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Facebook's parent company, Meta, has announced it will cut 10,000 jobs this year as part of a wider restructuring plan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It's the tech company's second round of mass layoffs after it saw a 4% slump in profits in 2022.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Executive Chairman Mark Zuckerberg said that last year had been a humbling wake-up call for Meta, pointing to a number of factors including rising interest rates and increased regulation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Following the announcement of the layoffs, Meta shares jumped by 6%.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Five hundred days on the scoreboard and beaucoup de choses à faire. La France a commencé la comptabilité pour les Olympiques de Paris 2024.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: En parlant à la police de la capitale le dimanche, le président Emmanuel Macron a appelé à tous ceux qui étaient impliqués pour faire leur mieux pour faire le défi un succès.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Être à l'heure et dans l'excellence en termes de réalisation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Mais ce n'est pas parce qu'on est bon aujourd'hui qu'il faut relâcher quoi que ce soit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Les 500 jours à venir, on doit mettre une pression maximale pour avoir des jeux qui seront vos jeux.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Je compte sur vous. Merci du boulot fait, mais ne lâchez rien pour les 500 jours à venir.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Il nous reste énormément à faire. live the Republic and long live France.
